Articles.Content: Whenever I watch people play KSPI Extended on youtube, their Alcubierre drives hold 20,000 exotic matter. Whenever I play, mine holds only around 250 exotic matter. Could anyone explain this and help me?

It's been a month! Nobody answered?

Edited January 23, 2018 by JEB'S DESTINY
You know that this mod has a thread in the addons section where you could ask the developer and people who use it regularly?
